name: Orb Of FantaSea
description:
I was unable to finish the story segment of it but I was able to at least implement parts of it. 
You are a thief, who recently tried to steal from the King of Billiardopolis. The King has offered your freedom if you go to a recently uncovered ruin and recover an artifact lost to the ages, the Orb of FantaSea. Will you collect it and return with it or will you take it and run!

I found a small bug after submission, not game breaking but it sounded like I was able to edit it and be safe, however I kept the first upload to be safe. 

I designed the game myself but had some help from friends with:

CFN_TED with most of the 2D Assets 

Rebekah I. for help designing the final level

Sebastian W. for bug testing and assistance with Code.
